query.value:
SELECT 
`active_from` 
,`active_to` 
,`id` 
,`idempotency_key` 
,`is_snapshot` 
,to_json(`item`) `item` 
,`last_modified_ts` 
,`schema_version` 
,`is_deleted` 
,`state` 
,`is_current` 
,`version` 
,`ts_ms` 
,`lsn` 
,`op` 
,CAST(item:accountRef AS STRING) AS `item_accountRef` 
,CAST(item:businessGroup.id AS STRING) AS `item_businessGroup_id` 
,CAST(item:customerId AS STRING) AS `item_customerId` 
,CAST(item:distributionChannelId AS STRING) AS `item_distributionChannelId` 
,CAST(item:expirationDate AS STRING) AS `item_expirationDate` 
,CAST(item:extendedAttributes AS STRING) AS `item_extendedAttributes` 
,CAST(item:name AS STRING) AS `item_name` 
,CAST(item:offeringId AS STRING) AS `item_offeringId` 
,CAST(item:offeringName AS STRING) AS `item_offeringName` 
,CAST(item:parentId AS STRING) AS `item_parentId` 
--,CAST(item:prices AS STRING) AS `item_prices` 
,CAST(item:productFamilyId AS STRING) AS `item_productFamilyId` 
,CAST(item:productFamilyName AS STRING) AS `item_productFamilyName` 
,CAST(item:productRelationship[0].productId AS STRING) AS `item_productRelationship_productId` 
,CAST(item:productRelationship[0].relationshipType AS STRING) AS `item_productRelationship_relationshipType` 
,CAST(item:productSpecificationRef AS STRING) AS `item_productSpecificationRef` 
,CAST(item:quantity AS STRING) AS `item_quantity` 
,CAST(item:quoteId AS STRING) AS `item_quoteId` 
,CAST(item:relatedPartyRef AS STRING) AS `item_relatedPartyRef` 
,CAST(item:rootId AS STRING) AS `item_rootId` 
,CAST(item:type AS STRING) AS `item_type` 
,CAST(item:version AS STRING) AS `item_version` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedProcessedTimestamp` 
,`NUUDL_IsDeleted` 
,`NUUDL_DeleteType` 
,`NUUDL_ID` 
,`NUUDL_IsLatest` 
 
FROM dai.@{activity('Lookup_Source_Schema_Name').output.firstRow.SourceSchemaName}.`ibsitemshistory`
 WHERE NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'

SELECT 
    id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN exploded.characteristics.name = 'Technology' THEN exploded.characteristics.value[0] END) AS technology,
    MAX(CASE WHEN exploded.characteristics.name = 'International Phone Number' THEN exploded.characteristics.value[0] END) AS international_phone_number,
    MAX(CASE WHEN exploded.characteristics.name = 'Phone Number' THEN exploded.characteristics.value[0] END) AS phone_number,
    NUUDL_CuratedBatchID,
    NUUDL_IsCurrent,
    NUUDL_ValidFrom,
    NUUDL_ValidTo,
    NUUDL_ID
FROM (
  SELECT 
    id, 
    explode(from_json(CAST(item AS STRING), 'struct<characteristics:array<struct<name:string,value:array<string>>>>').characteristics) AS characteristics,
    NUUDL_CuratedBatchID,
    NUUDL_IsCurrent,
    NUUDL_ValidFrom,
    NUUDL_ValidTo,
    NUUDL_ID
  FROM dai.netcracker12.ibsitemshistory
) AS exploded
WHERE exploded.characteristics.name IN ('Technology','International Phone Number', 'Phone Number')
GROUP BY 
    id,    
    NUUDL_CuratedBatchID,
    NUUDL_IsCurrent,
    NUUDL_ValidFrom,
    NUUDL_ValidTo,
    NUUDL_ID

SELECT 
to_json(`attributes`) `attributes` 
,to_json(`changedby`) `changedby` 
,`date` 
,`description` 
,`id` 
,`name` 
,`ref_id` 
,`ref_type` 
,`source` 
,`source_state` 
,`target_state` 
,`ts_ms` 
,`lsn` 
,`op` 
,CAST(changedby:userId AS STRING) AS `changedby_userId` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedProcessedTimestamp` 
,`NUUDL_IsDeleted` 
,`NUUDL_DeleteType` 
,`NUUDL_ID` 
,`NUUDL_IsLatest` 
 
FROM dai.@{activity('Lookup_Source_Schema_Name').output.firstRow.SourceSchemaName}.`worklogitems`
 WHERE NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'

SELECT 
`NUUDL_SourceCreated` 
,`NUUDL_SourceUpdated` 
,`LINK_KUNDE_ID` 
,`LINK_KUNDENR` 
,`STILLING` 
,`FORNAVN` 
,`EFTERNAVN` 
,`BUSINESS_NAVN1` 
,`BUSINESS_NAVN2` 
,`KUNDE_KATEGORI` 
,`KUNDE_TYPE` 
,`CVR_NR` 
,`FOEDSELSDATO` 
,`CPR_NR` 
,`KOEN` 
,`SIKKERHEDSKODE` 
,`SLUT_MRK` 
,`TOTAL_ENGAGEMENT` 
,`UDLANDS_CVR_NR` 
,`KUNDE_STATUS` 
,`POPNAVN` 
,`POP_FORNAVN` 
,`POP_EFTERNAVN` 
,`AENDRINGSSTATUS` 
,`SIDST_OPD_TSTMP` 
,`SIDST_OPD_INIT` 
,`LINK_AARSAG_ID` 
,`BONUS_FLAG` 
,`NUUDL_ID` 
,`NUUDL_ValidFrom` 
,`NUUDL_ValidTo` 
,`NUUDL_IsCurrent` 
,`BIZ_BatchCreatedID` 
,`BIZ_BatchUpdatedID` 
,`NUUDL_PKLatest` 
,`NUUDL_CuratedBatchID` 
 
FROM linkit.`LINK_KUNDE`
 WHERE NUUDL_ValidTo>='2017-01-01' AND NUUDL_CuratedBatchID > '@{activity('Lookup_Last_Value_Loaded').output.firstRow.LastValueLoaded}'
